about_the_game:
OVERWHELMED is a dynamic Twin Stick Shooter that immerses players in a minimalistic and neon atmosphere.



Take control of a spaceship and face waves of enemies, from small drones to fearsome bosses, using your shooting and dashing skills to evade enemy fire.

As you progress, you'll earn rewards to upgrade your spaceship's features and purchase new characters to face the 6 terrible bosses standing in your way.



OVERWHELMED also introduces a special feature: the "Overheat".

A gauge fills up as you shoot, until it reaches 100%.

At that moment, you can no longer shoot, but you trigger your spaceship's special ability, allowing you to easily defeat waves of enemies for a limited time.

Use this ability wisely to overcome all obstacles!



OVERWHELMED features 6 playable characters, each with their own "Overheat" ability, music, and weapons.
Discover the unique gameplay style of each character and find the one that best suits your playstyle!
You'll have a varied arsenal to defeat enemies!



With its fast gameplay, catchy music, and immersive neon atmosphere, OVERWHELMED offers an addictive and challenging gaming experience you won't forget anytime soon.
Get ready to face the challenges ahead and become the master of OVERWHELMED!

Key features:

  • The Overheat : Shooting increases the overheat value. When it reaches 100%, it unleashes an ability that damages enemies on contact, but disables the player's shooting.
  • Minimalist neon aesthetic
  • 10+ skills to unlock
  • 5 challenging bosses
  • 6 spaceships with their own gameplay

OVERWHELMED is a dynamic Twin Stick Shooter that immerses players in a minimalistic and neon atmosphere.



Take control of a spaceship and face waves of enemies, from small drones to fearsome bosses, using your shooting and dashing skills to evade enemy fire.

As you progress, you'll earn rewards to upgrade your spaceship's features and purchase new characters to face the 6 terrible bosses standing in your way.



OVERWHELMED also introduces a special feature: the "Overheat".

A gauge fills up as you shoot, until it reaches 100%.

At that moment, you can no longer shoot, but you trigger your spaceship's special ability, allowing you to easily defeat waves of enemies for a limited time.

Use this ability wisely to overcome all obstacles!



OVERWHELMED features 6 playable characters, each with their own "Overheat" ability, music, and weapons.
Discover the unique gameplay style of each character and find the one that best suits your playstyle!
You'll have a varied arsenal to defeat enemies!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics should be enough
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6 GHz 64 bits Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card with at least 512MB of video memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Run on both Apple M1 and Intel Core M
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.5GHz 64 bits Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card with at least 1024MB of video memory
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: OVERWHELMED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews:
“This is an absolutely magnificent spin on the genre”
buriedtreasure
short_description: Enter the neon world of OVERWHELMED! Fight waves of enemies, using shooting and dashing skills to evade fire. Trigger your special Overdrive ability to defeat enemies more easily. Unlock characters, each with unique abilities and varied arsenal, to discover new gameplay styles.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
